description: Fix missing HTTP status codes in import route (PR review fixes)

userStories.title: Add status 500 to Claude API error response
userStories.description: As an API consumer, Claude API errors should return 500 not 200.
acceptanceCriteria: Add { status: 500 } to the NextResponse.json() for Claude API error catch block

userStories.title: Add status 502 to empty response error
userStories.description: As an API consumer, empty Claude response should return 502 Bad Gateway.
acceptanceCriteria: Add { status: 502 } to the NextResponse.json() for empty response check

userStories.title: Add status 422 to mammoth extraction error
userStories.description: As an API consumer, document extraction failures should return 422 Unprocessable Entity.
acceptanceCriteria: Add { status: 422 } to the NextResponse.json() for mammoth error catch block

userStories.title: Add status 500 to database/parse error
userStories.description: As an API consumer, database errors should return 500 not 200.
acceptanceCriteria: Add { status: 500 } to the NextResponse.json() for database error catch block
Also add { status: 500 } to the outer catch block around lines 370-377 if not already present
